hyderabad.name: Lemon Tree Hotel Gachibowli
hyderabad.heading: This lavish property makes for a relaxing stay option with its stylish rooms, multiple dining venues, spa treatments and easy connectivity to popular areas of the city
highlights: The property offers multiple dining options to delight your taste buds.
There is a lavish spa available where you can soothe your mind and body.
There is a well-equipped fitness centre where you can enjoy intense workout sessions.
There is a sparkling swimming pool available so that you can take a refreshing dip.
The property provides access to free Wi-Fi for your convenience.
The property facilitates on-site parking so that you can have a hassle-free driving experience.

hyderabad.name: Taj Deccan
hyderabad.heading: Experience refined luxury and heritage charm at Taj Deccan with its grand interiors and world-class amenities.
highlights: Enjoy a relaxing swim at the outdoor pool.
Dine at award-winning restaurants serving global cuisines.
Unwind at the Jiva Spa with signature wellness therapies.
Conveniently located near Hussain Sagar Lake and major malls.

hyderabad.name: ITC Kohenur, a Luxury Collection Hotel
hyderabad.heading: A luxury destination blending modern design with Hyderabadi heritage for an unforgettable experience.
highlights: Bask in the stunning views of Durgam Cheruvu Lake.
Relax at Kaya Kalp Spa with rejuvenating treatments.
Savour global and local delicacies at multiple fine-dining venues.
State-of-the-art conference and wedding facilities.

hyderabad.name: Trident Hyderabad
hyderabad.heading: Modern architecture, elegant interiors, and exceptional service define Trident Hyderabad’s charm.
highlights: Enjoy city views from your elegant rooms.
Relish delectable cuisines at Kanak and Amara.
Take a dip in the infinity pool overlooking Cyber Towers.
Close proximity to Hitech City’s business hubs.

hyderabad.name: Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel
hyderabad.heading: An upscale retreat featuring plush rooms, fine dining, and rejuvenating spa treatments.
highlights: Indulge in world cuisines at Chill Restaurant & Terrace.
Unwind with a cocktail at the elegant bar.
Experience relaxing spa massages and a sauna.
Ideal for both business and leisure travelers.

hyderabad.name: Novotel Hyderabad Airport
hyderabad.heading: Perfect for transit and leisure, Novotel offers a seamless blend of comfort and convenience near the airport.
highlights: Complimentary airport shuttle service.
Large outdoor pool with sun loungers.
24/7 restaurant serving global delicacies.
Spacious rooms with soundproofing and work desks.

hyderabad.name: The Park Hyderabad
hyderabad.heading: A stylish lifestyle hotel overlooking Hussain Sagar Lake with vibrant nightlife and modern comforts.
highlights: Stunning lake view infinity pool.
Trendy Aqua Bar and Kismet Nightclub.
Signature spa offering holistic therapies.
Contemporary rooms with artistic interiors.

mumbai.name: Trident Nariman Point
mumbai.heading: Enjoy spectacular views of the Arabian Sea from Trident Nariman Point, a symbol of luxury and sophistication in Mumbai.
highlights: Located on Marine Drive offering breathtaking sea views.
Fine dining restaurants serving global cuisines.
Outdoor pool overlooking the Arabian Sea.
Elegant rooms with modern amenities and 24-hour service.

mumbai.name: Taj Lands End Mumbai
mumbai.heading: Experience timeless elegance and unmatched hospitality at Taj Lands End overlooking the Arabian Sea.
highlights: Spectacular views of the Bandra-Worli Sea Link.
Award-winning spa and fine dining options.
Spacious suites with luxurious amenities.
Located close to Bandra’s vibrant nightlife.

mumbai.name: ITC Grand Central, a Luxury Collection Hotel
mumbai.heading: Blending colonial charm with contemporary luxury, ITC Grand Central offers an elegant stay in South Mumbai.
highlights: Panoramic views from the high-rise tower.
Indulge at Kaya Kalp Spa and rooftop pool.
Exquisite dining experiences with authentic cuisines.
Close to business hubs and cultural landmarks.

mumbai.name: The Oberoi Mumbai
mumbai.heading: A landmark of elegance and world-class hospitality offering sea-facing luxury in the heart of Mumbai.
highlights: Iconic sea-facing location on Marine Drive.
Michelin-star inspired restaurants and bar.
Personalized butler service in all suites.
Known for its unmatched hospitality and style.

mumbai.name: Radisson Blu Mumbai International Airport
mumbai.heading: A contemporary upscale hotel offering convenient access to Mumbai Airport and top-notch amenities.
highlights: Just 10 minutes from Mumbai International Airport.
Luxurious spa and wellness center.
Spacious rooms designed for business travelers.
All-day dining restaurant serving global cuisine.

mumbai.name: Novotel Mumbai Juhu Beach
mumbai.heading: A beachfront haven offering stunning views of the Arabian Sea and modern comfort at Juhu Beach.

Infinity pool overlooking the ocean.

World-class restaurants and rooftop lounges.

maldivas.name: Sun Siyam Olhuveli Maldives
maldivas.heading: Experience paradise with beachfront villas, fine dining, and breathtaking ocean views at this luxury resort.

Indulge in global cuisines across 9 dining venues.
Enjoy water sports like snorkeling, diving, and parasailing.
Unwind by the infinity pool overlooking the turquoise lagoon.

maldivas.name: Adaaran Prestige Vadoo
maldivas.heading: A romantic adults-only overwater resort offering luxurious villas, private pools, and exceptional dining experiences.
highlights: Private water villas with direct ocean access.
In-villa breakfast and floating meals available.
Jacuzzi and glass floor panel in every villa.
Ideal for honeymooners and couples’ getaways.

All-inclusive dining and themed buffets.
Two freshwater pools and a dedicated kids’ pool.
Award-winning spa with overwater treatment rooms.

Spa offering ocean-view massages and treatments.

maldivas.name: Kuramathi Maldives
maldivas.heading: A scenic island resort featuring spacious villas, lush greenery, and one of the largest lagoons in the Maldives.

18 restaurants and bars serving global cuisines.
Sandbank stretching into the lagoon.
Marine biology center and eco tours.

maldivas.name: LUX* South Ari Atoll Resort & Villas
maldivas.heading: A five-star tropical paradise offering beachfront luxury villas, cinematic experiences, and world-class cuisine.

shimla.name: The Oberoi Cecil

shimla.name: Wildflower Hall, An Oberoi Resort
shimla.heading: Experience luxury amid cedar forests at Wildflower Hall, a heritage-style resort offering world-class wellness and stunning Himalayan views.

Exclusive spa with open-air treatment areas.
Guided nature walks and mountain biking.
Colonial-style rooms with breathtaking views.

shimla.name: Clarkes Hotel
shimla.heading: One of Shimla’s oldest hotels, Clarkes blends colonial elegance with warm hospitality and mountain charm.
highlights: Located right on Mall Road for easy access to attractions.
Beautiful heritage architecture and antique interiors.
Fine dining with panoramic views.
Ideal for couples and families alike.

shimla.name: Taj Theog Resort & Spa
shimla.heading: Perched high in the Himalayas, Taj Theog offers stunning views, serene surroundings, and unmatched luxury.

Spacious rooms with wooden interiors and private balconies.

shimla.name: Marigold Sarovar Portico

shimla.name: Snow Valley Resorts Shimla

Multi-cuisine restaurant serving Indian and Chinese fare.
Kids play area and outdoor seating for families.
Perfect for a cozy hillside retreat.

ooty.name: Sterling Ooty Elk Hill
ooty.heading: Nestled amidst the Nilgiris, this property offers breathtaking valley views, cozy rooms, and a tranquil spa experience.
highlights: Located atop Elk Hill with panoramic views of Ooty town.
Enjoy a rejuvenating spa session at the in-house wellness center.
Relish local delicacies at the multi-cuisine restaurant.
Spacious rooms with modern amenities and free Wi-Fi.
Kids play area and bonfire nights for family enjoyment.

ooty.name: Club Mahindra Derby Green
ooty.heading: Experience the charm of colonial architecture with modern comforts, just minutes from Ooty’s famous attractions.

Heritage-style architecture with modern rooms.
Bonfire evenings and local tea tasting events.
Free Wi-Fi and parking available.

ooty.name: Gem Park Ooty
ooty.heading: A luxurious hilltop stay offering panoramic views of the Nilgiris, elegant rooms, and fine dining options.
highlights: Features a temperature-controlled indoor pool.
Modern spa and wellness center available.
Restaurant offering North Indian, South Indian, and Continental dishes.
Proximity to Ooty Rose Garden and Doddabetta Peak.
Elegant rooms with large windows overlooking the valley.

ooty.name: Sinclairs Retreat Ooty
ooty.heading: Perched on a hilltop, this elegant retreat offers peaceful surroundings, modern amenities, and mesmerizing views.
highlights: Unmatched 360° views of Ooty’s landscape.
Restaurant serving authentic Tamil Nadu and continental cuisine.
Dedicated game zone and fitness area.
Evening bonfires and live music nights.
Ample parking and 24-hour front desk service.

ooty.name: Savoy - IHCL SeleQtions
ooty.heading: A heritage property by Taj, blending colonial elegance with modern comfort amidst Ooty’s serene hills.

Traditional afternoon tea served in the courtyard.
Pet-friendly property with lush outdoor spaces.

ooty.name: Fortune Resort Sullivan Court

Multi-cuisine restaurant and bar available on-site.
24-hour gym and wellness facilities.
Banquet hall and business conference amenities.
Free Wi-Fi and valet parking for all guests.

ooty.name: Accord Highland Hotel Ooty
ooty.heading: A modern getaway surrounded by pine forests, offering adventure activities and cozy accommodations near Doddabetta Peak.

Spacious rooms with private balconies.
Bonfire evenings with live music.

munnar.name: Parakkat Nature Hotels & Resorts
